resources.string:
Snowflake uses Accessibility Service to enable universal automation features: 

• Read screen content for AI analysis 
• Automate WhatsApp messaging 
• Auto-fill forms and click buttons 
• Control apps with voice commands 

Your privacy is protected - all data stays on your device.
Frost Vision needs camera access to see and analyze your surroundings in real-time.
Snowflake needs microphone access to listen to your voice commands.
Snowflake needs overlay permission to show the floating bubble interface.
